issue.title: [C++] Remove compile time parsing from EnumType
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13346](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13346). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
EnumType doesn't **need** to parse a string at compile time, remove that logic to ensure minimal build time overhead

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13346?focusedCommentId=17381593) by Ben Kietzman (bkietz):*
Issue resolved by pull request 10726
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/10726>
